title: Un Mauvais Fils = a Bad Son
description: Bruno returns to Paris after serving five years in an American prison for drug trafficking. Readjustment proves difficult as he searches for work, faces his working-class father who holds his past behaviour responsible for his mother's death, and has an affair with another ex-addict, whose drug problems are not fully resolved. Awards: French Academy of Cinema (Cesar) 1980: Best supporting actor for Jacques Dufilho.  Credits: Producer, Alain Sarde ; director, Claude Sautet ; writers, Claude Sautet, Daniel Biasini, Jean-Paul Torok ; photography, Jean Boffety ; music, Philippe Sarde. Cast: Patrick Dewaere, Yves Robert, Brigitte Fossey, Jacques Dufilho, Claire Maurier.
